name: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.TextFinderOptionKey
desc: Search options for text in Finder.

items.name: static let textFinderCaseInsensitiveKey: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.TextFinderOptionKey
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the search is case insensitive.

items.name: static let textFinderMatchingTypeKey: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.TextFinderOptionKey
items.desc: A number object containing the match type to use.
